title: Strengthening Software Development Competencies: Foundations of Neuroanatomy: Understanding Through Web-Based Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately describe the main components and functional connections of spinal pathways using a 3D web simulation tool.
Learners can complete at least 80% of a clinical case analysis project using neuroanatomical web resources.
Learners can submit individual learning portfolios that incorporate peer feedback according to an evaluation rubric.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
